idea:
Wrapmygift is a gifting solution providing platform wherein people can discover new and innovative gifts that can be gifted to their loved ones. Wrapmygift will not only make gifts in-house but will also get all kinds of creative people like painters, craftsmen, artisans etc on board, enable and empower them with our technology and digital platform and help them serve a wide range of audience thus enabling them to grow their income.

Example - A candle-maker who is located in Mumbai, selling his/her products in and around Mumbai. But if he/she comes on our platform, registers himself/herself and after a thorough BGV process they can start selling their products across India in less than 36 hours. This will help them cater a wider range of audience which will help them grow their turnover and income.
name: Wrapmygift

idea:
Mosaik is a derivative of the word Mosaic. Mosaic Theory is an analytical process that involves collecting and analysing information from a range of sources in order to determine the underlying value of a company. Our core capabilities are built around the unspoken need for building trust in business – combining knowledge, background, skills and perspectives of a team of experienced global professionals.

It is an advanced, collaborative and interpretative platform, designed to minimize the inherent information asymmetry between corporate borrowers and lenders. It collates, synthesizes and analyses data about borrowers (and its ecosystem) from numerous sources both structured and unstructured. It enables early identification of potential problems by providing incipient signals of stress in borrower accounts thereby enhancing the actionable horizon of lenders.
name: MOSAIK ANALYTICS SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We strive to ensure that our clients are getting highest quality products from us. Our range of products is manufactured only using premium quality raw material with latest industry standards. We have quality assurance team that tests products at various stages to ensure a flawless range of products.Our constant and vast experience and interaction with our customers has helped us develop better products and also design and selection of maintenance free and cost effective solutions. We are constantly adding new products to our range making it more and more exhaustive. This we have been able to achieve by having direct interaction with the end users i.e. direct industries situated at various different locations and their Valuable Suggestions and Contributions. We Give Safety, We Serve Safety with Awareness of Electrical Safety Provided & meet all Requirement to Reduce Electrical Accident. In that Manner Our Team Regularly Develops Complete Mach to Flame & Explosion Standard as per CMFRI, BIS, PESO & European ATEX, IS IEC Standard. We Manufacture World largest Flameproof & Explosion Proof Enclosure, All Type & ranges of flameproof enclosures, Flameproof Light fittings, Flameproof Cable Glands, Flameproof Switchgear, Flameproof Control Gears, Flameproof Junction Boxes, Flameproof Industrial Fans, Flameproof Instrument Boxes, Flameproof VFD & PLC panels and other accessories.

The company employ several enclosure specialists who have a vast experience of major projects for the oil and gas industry and major infrastructure projects. By drawing on this wealth of experience SHREE ELECTRICAL & ENGINEERING CO. have been able to incorporate many new design features into their product range which enable cost savings to be made during manufacture, resulting in highly competitive pricing to you our customer.
name: SHREE FLAME PROOF INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
M/s Ra4Mi B2B Private Limited – is an Authorized Distributor of “Grindwell Norton Limited” – A Saint Gobin company, focused to serve direct customers along with other business opportunities. We are happy to submit a brief note on the brand that we represent along with the product.

Brief Introduction of “Grindwell Norton Ltd” (GNO):

GNO is India’s leading manufacturer of Abrasives (Bonded, Coated, Non-Woven, Super abrasives and Thin Wheels) and Silicon Carbide and sits at the forefront of the industry providing highly engineered, high performance value-adding abrasive solutions, thanks to its continual investment in R&D and close collaboration with customers.

Norton offers powerful, precise and user friendly solutions that enable our customers to shape and finish all types of materials even in the most complex and challenging applications. From simple cutting, grinding, sanding and finishing activities in the DIY market to highly technical, precision operations in specialist manufacturing industries, we understand abrasive safety, quality, performance and cost is critical and can provide a range of solutions to meet any demand. Discover how Norton can help you optimize your abrasive applications

Products Ranges available:

 Thin Wheels

 Coated Abrasives

 Bonded Abrasives

 Construction abrasives

 Non-Woven Abrasives

 Super Abrasives
name: RA4MI B2B PRIVATE LIMITED
